mapper.select: SELECT fb.FREE_BOARD_ID AS freeBoardId, fb.FREE_BOARD_TITLE AS freeBoardTitle, fb.FREE_BOARD_CONTENT AS freeBoardContent, m.MEMBER_NAME AS memberName, TO_CHAR(fb.FREE_BOARD_CREATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS freeBoardCreate, coalesce(commentData.freeBoardCommentCount, 0) AS freeBoardCommentCount FROM FREE_BOARD fb JOIN MEMBER m ON fb.MEMBER_ID = m.MEMBER_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT FREE_BOARD_ID, COUNT(FREE_BOARD_COMMENT_ID) AS freeBoardCommentCount FROM FREE_BOARD_COMMENT GROUP BY FREE_BOARD_ID ) commentData ON fb.FREE_BOARD_ID = commentData.FREE_BOARD_ID ORDER BY fb.FREE_BOARD_ID DESC

SELECT fb.FREE_BOARD_ID AS freeBoardId, fb.FREE_BOARD_TITLE AS freeBoardTitle, fb.FREE_BOARD_CONTENT AS freeBoardContent, m.MEMBER_NAME AS memberName, TO_CHAR(fb.FREE_BOARD_CREATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS freeBoardCreate, coalesce(commentData.freeBoardCommentCount, 0) AS freeBoardCommentCount FROM FREE_BOARD fb JOIN MEMBER m ON fb.MEMBER_ID = m.MEMBER_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT FREE_BOARD_ID, COUNT(FREE_BOARD_COMMENT_ID) AS freeBoardCommentCount FROM FREE_BOARD_COMMENT GROUP BY FREE_BOARD_ID ) commentData ON fb.FREE_BOARD_ID = commentData.FREE_BOARD_ID WHERE 1=1
AND (fb.FREE_BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%' OR m.MEMBER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%')
AND fb.FREE_BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
AND m.MEMBER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
ORDER BY fb.FREE_BOARD_ID DESC
